35.name: Invader
35.description: Earn at least 80 capture points on the enemy base.

37.name: Defender
37.description: Reduce the number of enemy capture points of a friendly base by 70 or more.

50.name: Orlik's Medal
50.description: Destroy 2 or more enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a light tank in one battle.

51.name: Oskin's Medal
51.description: Destroy 3 enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a medium tank in one battle.

52.name: Halonen's Medal
52.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a tank destroyer in one battle.

53.name: Burda's Medal
53.description: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

54.name: Billotte's Medal
54.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

55.name: Kolobanov's Medal
55.description: Stand alone against at least five enemy vehicles and win.

56.name: Fadin's Medal
56.description: Destroy the last enemy vehicle in the battle with the last shell in the ammo.

76.name: Tarczay's Medal
76.description: Destroy at least 5 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

77.name: Pascucci's Medal
77.description: Destroy 2 enemy SPGs in one battle.

78.name: Burda's Medal
78.description: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

61.name: Raider
61.description: Remain undetected throughout the entire battle and be the only player who captures the enemy base.

64.name: Kamikaze
64.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by ramming it.

298.name: Gore's Medal
298.description: Drive an SPG and cause damage exceeding 8 times the hit points of your vehicle.

300.name: Stark's Medal
300.description: While driving an SPG, destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles and receive at least 2 enemy hits that cause damage or are blocked by armor.

147.name: Bombardier
147.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles with one shell.

523.name: Duelist
523.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles that caused damage to your vehicle in the battle.

522.name: Fighter
522.description: Destroy four or five enemy vehicles in one battle.

525.name: Arsonist
525.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by setting it on fire.

34.name: Top Gun
34.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 6 and more — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 8 and more — Grand Battle.

38.name: Steel Wall
38.description: Receive the highest damage blocked by armor.

39.name: Confederate
39.description: Cause damage or critical hits to more enemy vehicles, at least 6, than any other player.

72.name: Patrol Duty
72.description: Help your team damage at least 6 enemy vehicles by spotting them.

227.name: Sniper
227.description: Achieve at least 85% hits out of a minimum of 10 shots fired with potential damage of 1,000 HP or more.

228.name: High Caliber
228.description: Cause the highest damage in a battle.

232.name: War Genius
232.description: In 100 battles, be the top player by experience earned.

230.name: Wolf Among Sheep
230.description: Win 100 battles and be the top player by damage caused.

73.name: Radley-Walters's Medal
73.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 8-9 — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 10-12 — Grand Battle.

74.name: Pool's Medal
74.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 10-13 — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 13-20 — Grand Battle.

75.name: Bruno's Medal
75.description: Destroy 3-4 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

62.name: Reaper
62.description: Destroy at least three enemy vehicles in a row. The second and all consecutive vehicles must be destroyed with a single shell each.

10.name: Nicols's Medal
10.description: Destroy at least 4 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

106.name: Lehväslaiho's Medal
106.description: Destroy 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a medium tank in one battle.

110.name: Raseiniai Heroes' Medal
110.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 14 and more — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 21 and more — Grand Battle.

145.name: De Langlade's Medal
145.description: Destroy at least 4 enemy vehicles while they are attempting to capture the base in one battle.

146.name: Yoshio Tamada's Medal
146.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy SPGs in a light tank in one battle.

148.name: Naydin's Medal
148.description: Destroy all enemy light tanks (at least 3) in the course of one battle.

237.name: Tactical Genius
237.description: Win at least 3 battles in a row as a member of a random team.

297.name: For Counter-Battery Fire
297.description: In a battle, destroy all enemy SPGs (at least 2) with an SPG.

299.name: Cold-Blooded
299.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy light tanks from a distance of not more than 100 meters.

289.name: Will-to-Win Spirit
289.description: Fight alone against at least 3 enemy vehicles and win the battle.

517.name: Shellproof
517.description: Have total damage blocked by armor exceed the hit points of your vehicle.

521.name: Fire for Effect
521.description: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles than the hit points of your vehicle.

529.name: Spotter
529.description: Spot enemy vehicles, enabling your allies to cause 1,000 HP of damage in one battle.

143.name: Brothers in Arms
143.description: Each Platoon member must destroy at least 3 enemy vehicles.

144.name: Crucial Contribution
144.description: Platoon must destroy at least 12 enemy vehicles.

236.name: Armored Fist
236.description: Destroy all enemy vehicles while losing only one friendly vehicle.

150.name: Spartan
150.description: Survive a ricochet or non-penetrating hit from an enemy team player. Your vehicle must have less than 10% of its hit points left.

151.name: Cool-Headed
151.description: Survive at least 10 ricochets and non-penetrating hits in a row from enemy team players.

152.name: Lucky
152.description: Witness an enemy vehicle being hit and destroyed by another enemy team player. You must be 10 meters or closer from the enemy vehicle at the moment of its destruction.

233.name: King of the Hill
233.description: Be the only survivor while driving a tank or a tank destroyer.

286.name: God of War
286.description: While driving an SPG, be the last survivor and win the battle.

296.name: Rock Solid
296.description: When driving an SPG, survive the ramming that destroys an enemy vehicle.

479.name: Scorched Earth
479.description: End a battle in a draw where both teams are completely destroyed.

526.name: Bruiser
526.description: Damage enemy vehicles' modules or injure crew members at least five times in a battle.

527.name: Hand of God
527.description: Survive and win the battle, having received damage from at least four different enemy vehicles.

524.name: Demolition Expert
524.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by causing its ammunition to explode.

528.name: Eye for an Eye!
528.description: Simultaneously destroy, and be destroyed, by the same enemy.

536.name: First Merit
536.description: Complete any mission in any set of the selected operation.

589.name: Tactical Superiority
589.description: Destroy all enemy vehicles while losing only one vehicle of the lowest tier on your team.

591.name: Tactical Supremacy
591.description: Win the battle by destroying all enemy vehicles while not losing any allied vehicles.

592.name: Sudden Strike
592.description: Win the battle by capturing the enemy base with a group of at least 2 allied vehicles or with at least 1 vehicle of each team capturing both bases at the same time.

599.name: Rocket Scientist
599.description: Complete a special mission and receive a secret weapon.
